spell_tooltip.description: Call upon the light to blind enemy players in a 25 yd cone, causing enemies to miss their spells and attacks for 4 sec.
Your Blessing of Sacrifice now transfers 100% of all damage to you into a damage over time effect, but lasts 6 sec and no longer cancels when you are below 20% health.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 60 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 60 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 60 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 214,268 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 135,050 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.
Instantly cast Holy Shock on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by 30%. Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Sacrifice reduce the target's damage taken by 15%. These effects linger for 8 sec after the Blessing ends.
Armor increased by 24%, Stamina increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 7%.
The radius of your auras is increased by 20 yds.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Allies are healed for 101,604 when you cast a Blessing spell on them and healed again for 100,886 when the blessing ends.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 16,043.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Your auto attacks heal a nearby ally for 50,888.
Flash of Light and Holy Light are 10% more effective on your allies and 10% of the healing done also heals you.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 15% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.
10% of all healing done to you from other sources heals up to 4 nearby allies, divided evenly among them.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 213,115 Holy damage to an enemy, or 355,695 healing to an ally.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn gain up to 30% additional chance to critically strike, based on their target's current health. Lower health targets are more likely to be critically struck.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 184,773.
Holy Shock now has 2 charges and it refunds 50% of its mana cost when cast on an enemy.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

Devotion Aura: Damage reduction increased to 12%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Casting Flash of Light or Holy Light grants 1 Holy Power.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec per Holy Power spent and restores 5% of your Mana.
Each Holy Power spent on Word of Glory increases the healing of your next Light of Dawn by 5%, up to a maximum of 45%.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.

Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals 650,936 Holy damage and radiates 510,170 healing to 5 allies within 30 yds.

If the beam is aimed at a friendly target, it heals for 1.1 million and radiates 252,792 Holy damage to 5 enemies within 30 yds.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.
After casting Barrier of Faith or Holy Prism, the healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by 20%, its cast time is reduced by 30%, and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 50% health, they absorb the next 880,761 damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Allies with Beacon of Light receive 5% less damage.
30% of Holy Shock's overhealing is converted into an absorb shield. The shield amount cannot exceed 10% of your max health.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Saved by the Light's absorb effect at 33% effectiveness without activating its cooldown.
While empowered by Infusion of Light, Flash of Light heals for an additional 20%, and Holy Light or Judgment refund 0.5% of your maximum mana.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.
Mark a second target as a Beacon, mimicking the effects of Beacon of Light. Your heals will now heal both of your Beacons, but at 30% reduced effectiveness.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 15% for 20 sec.

Releases the Light within yourself, healing 5 injured allies instantly and an injured ally every 0.8 sec for 20 sec within 40 yds for 35,723.

Allies healed also receive 12% increased healing from your Holy Light, Flash of Light, and Holy Shock spells for 12 sec.
Judgment heals you for 244,264 and its mana cost is reduced by 30%. 50% of overhealing from this effect is transferred onto 2 allies within 40 yds.
Crusader Strike reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock and Judgment by 2.0 sec.

While in combat, your Holy Power spenders generate 1 stack of Awakening.

At 15 stacks of Awakening, your next Judgment deals 40% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for 12 sec.
Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.
Holy Shock has a 12% chance to refund a charge when cast and its healing is increased by 10%.

Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing 12% of all healing to be converted into damage onto a nearby enemy and 12% of all damage to be converted into healing onto an injured ally within 40 yds.

Blessing of the Seasons: Turns to Autumn after use.

Casting Holy Prism or Barrier of Faith causes your next 2 Holy Power spending abilities to apply Dawnlight on your target, dealing 441,242 Radiant damage or 968,531 healing over 8 sec.

8% of Dawnlight's damage and healing radiates to nearby allies or enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Dawnlight's healing does not transfer to Beacon of Light.
While a Dawnlight is active, your Holy Power spenders deal 5% additional damage or healing.

Heals an ally for 807,583 and an additional 127,468 over 16 sec.

Healing increased by 25% when cast on self.
Critical Strike chance of Holy Shock and Light of Dawn increased by 5%.

Movement speed increased by 5% while above 80% health.

When your health is brought below 35%, your movement speed is increased by 40% for 5 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 1 min.
Your damage and healing over time effects have a chance to increase the healing or damage of your next Holy Shock by 200%.
Holy Shock and Light of Dawn critical strikes cause the target to be healed for an additional 82,353 over 4 sec.

After you cast Holy Prism or Barrier of Faith, gain Divine Purpose.

 Divine Purpose
Your next Holy Power spending ability is free and deals 15% increased damage and healing.
Your Haste is increased by 2% for 12 sec each time you apply Dawnlight. Multiple stacks may overlap.
Light of Dawn and Holy Shock have a 15% chance to cast again at 30% effectiveness.

During Avenging Wrath, you become linked to your Dawnlights, causing 21,138 Radiant damage to enemies or 18,961 healing to allies that pass through the beams, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Activating Avenging Wrath applies up to 4 Dawnlights onto nearby allies or enemies and increases Dawnlight's duration by 20%.

Sun's Avatar's healing does not transfer to Beacon of Light.

The effect of your active Aura is increased by 33% on targets with your Armaments.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Armaments by 3.0 sec.
Judgment critical strikes cause a shockwave around the target, dealing 415,249 healing at the target's location.
Avenging Wrath summons an additional Sacred Weapon, and during Avenging Wrath your Sacred Weapon casts spells on your target and echoes the effects of your Holy Power abilities.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 60 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 60 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 60 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 211,635 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 135,050 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.
Instantly cast Holy Shock on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.
Armor increased by 24%, Stamina increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 7%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.

After your Blessing of Sacrifice ends, 50% of the total damage it diverted is added to your next Judgment as bonus damage, or your next Word of Glory as bonus healing.

This effect's bonus damage cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health and its bonus healing cannot exceed 100% of your maximum health.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Allies are healed for 100,730 when you cast a Blessing spell on them and healed again for 103,500 when the blessing ends.
Allies affected by your Blessings have 15% increased movement speed.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 15,886.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Your auto attacks heal a nearby ally for 50,888.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 4,233 every 0.8 sec.

Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 193,296.
Holy Shock now has 2 charges and it refunds 50% of its mana cost when cast on an enemy.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.

Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.

Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals 648,846 Holy damage and radiates 509,672 healing to 5 allies within 30 yds.

The cooldown of Aura Mastery is reduced by 30 sec.

Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.

Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.

Apply a Beacon of Light to your target and 4 injured allies within 30 yds for 8 sec.
